name: @omidteimoori/node-red-data-generator
description: A customizable Node-RED node to simulate various data patterns including sinusoidal, random, rising, falling, square, triangle, and sawtooth. Ideal for testing and prototyping dashboards, PLC interfaces, and IoT flows.
author: Omid Teimoori <omid@teimoori.com> (https://omidteimoori.com)
